messages.subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling-Discussion group name/addresses have changed
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, The moderator of the Unschooling-Discussion group has changed the group s name. This means that both the group s email address and the group home page
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

The moderator of the Unschooling-Discussion group has changed the group's name.
This means that both the group's email address and the group home page
location have changed.

The group email address:
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com

The group home page location:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingDiscussion

If you have links which point to this group or an address book entry
for the group, you should update them, as the old addresses will no
longer work.

Regards,

Yahoo! Groups Customer Care
